tasks.label: IPEDS: Panelize (JDBC)
args:
cd '${workspaceFolder}' && source .venv/bin/activate && \ 
         python3 ipeds/panelize.py \ 
           --db-root "/Users/markjaysonfarol13/Higher Ed research/IPEDS/IPEDS workspace/IPEDS COMPLETE DATABASE" \ 
           --out-root "/Users/markjaysonfarol13/Higher Ed research/IPEDS/IPEDS workspace/PANELS" \ 
           --titles  "/Users/markjaysonfarol13/Documents/GitHub/Higher-Ed-Research/titles_2023.txt" \ 
           --years 2004-2023 \ 
           --ucanaccess-lib "/Users/markjaysonfarol13/lib/ucanaccess" \ 
           --mode jdbc

tasks.label: IPEDS: Panelize (CSV fallback)
args:
cd '${workspaceFolder}' && source .venv/bin/activate && \ 
         python3 ipeds/panelize.py \ 
           --db-root "/Users/markjaysonfarol13/Higher Ed research/IPEDS/IPEDS workspace/IPEDS COMPLETE DATABASE" \ 
           --out-root "/Users/markjaysonfarol13/Higher Ed research/IPEDS/IPEDS workspace/PANELS" \ 
           --titles  "/Users/markjaysonfarol13/Documents/GitHub/Higher-Ed-Research/titles_2023.txt" \ 
           --years 2004-2023 \ 
           --mode csvmeta \ 
           --csv-vartable-root "/Users/markjaysonfarol13/Documents/GitHub/Higher-Ed-Research/exports"
